name: Prince's Trail
description:
===About===

-This is a work in progress.

-Please try out the Windows version for a better experience.

-Made in 14 days for the Gamedev.tv Jam 2021.

-The theme is "Not everything that glitters is gold".

===Story===

The village prince's has been kidnapped into the woods. Unfortunately there's only one mage powerful enough to sense his steps using magic. Now with just only one old lamp and some firing casting skills she needs to enter the dark forest and follow the prince's trail, but beware, not everything that shines is gold and so dangers can meet you path!

===Controls===

-[W] & [S]  Walk forward and backwards.

-[Mouse] Aim fireball

-[Left Mouse Click] Shoot fireball

-[R] Restart

===Credits=== Developers

-Corie Watson (Core) as Coder

-Eduardo Seitz (DevPenguin) as Coder and 3D Modeler

-Mario (Katharsy) as VFX Engineer

-Ben (Synth) as 3D Modeler

-Ben (benbgm3) as Audio Engineer

Free Assets Used

-Font Knhum by T Christopher White

-Font Roundstyle by Wojciech Kalinowski

-Unity Asset Post Process Stack V3

===Other===

Jam's Page: https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-game-jam-2021

Source Code: https://github.com/CorieW/Princes-Path
